data.text: Ginɛ lɔnnila sɛnbɛ fima nɛ a xa denbaya ma,
Mixi naxan a ɲɛrɛma a tinxinxi ra, a gaaxuma nɛ Ala ya ra,
Yɛtɛ igboe xa wɔyɛnyi findima bɔnbɔɛ nan na a bɛ,
Xa ninge mu bɔxi buxama, saga mu rafema.
Seede fanyi mu wule falama,
Mixi mayele lɔnni fenma nɛ, kɔnɔ a mu a sɔtɔma.
I xa i makuya xaxilitaree ra,
Lɔnnila a ɲɔxɔ sama nɛ a ɲɛrɛ ki xɔn ma,
Xaxilitare yoma yunubi tongofe ma,
Mixi a yɛtɛ xa tɔɔrɛ kolon a bɔɲɛ kui,
Mixi ɲaaxie xa denbaya halakima nɛ,
Mixi ɲɔxɔ a ma a a ɲɛrɛ ki fan,
Mixi nɔma yelede a dɛ ra, a tɔɔrɔxi a bɔɲɛ kui.
Mixi ɲaaxi yo, mixi fanyi yo,
Xaxilitare lama nɛ mixi birin xa masenyi ra,
Xaxilima gaaxuma nɛ Ala ya ra, a fa gbilen fe ɲaaxi fɔxɔ ra,
Mixi naxan bɔɲɛ tema mafuren, a daxuɲa nan nabama.
Daxuɲa findima nɛ xaxilitare kɛ ra,
Mixi ɲaaxie fama nɛ e xinbi sinde tinxintɔɛe bun ma,
Setare raɲaaxu birin ma, hali a dɔxɔboore,
Mixi naxan yoma a ngaxakerenyi ma, a bara yunubi sɔtɔ,
Mixi naxee fe ɲaaxi maɲɔxunma, nee bɔnɔma nɛ.
Geeni na wali birin kui,
Bannaya nan na lɔnnila sare ra,
Seede nɔndi falɛ mixi nii ratangama nɛ,
Mixi naxan gaaxu Alatala ya ra,
Alatala xa yaragaaxui simaya fima nɛ mixi ma,
Ɲama xa gboe findima mangɛ xa xunnakeli nan na,
Xaxilima bɔɲɛ te xɔnɔ,
Bɔɲɛsa findima simaya nan na,
Naxan setare tɔɔrɔma, na bara yo setare Daa Mangɛ ma,
Mixi ɲaaxi xa ɲaaxuɲa a xun nakanama nɛ,
Lɔnni na xaxilima bɔɲɛ kui,
Tinxinyi bɔxi rasigama nɛ yare,
Walikɛ lɔnnila rafan mangɛ ma, kɔnɔ a walikɛ yaagitare tan xɔnma nɛ.
